content: Bank Account PFF Panel 3 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019Is the high yield saving accounts rates shown by SG BB still relevant today? DBS BYOB still allows new account?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Dawn FionaLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 03 Mar 2019Hello! They're still relevant but DBS BYOB is no longer accepting new registrants. I've kept it in the table as many of my readers signed up for it after reading my review in August 2017, and they are still getting the 2+2% on it now. Will strike it out once the 2 year period is up at the end of this year :)0 comments0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 02 Mar 2019Yes it is still relevant but do remember some have requirements such as salary crediting, credit card spending and so on.0 comments0
